title: What would Greta Thunberg do? Six things to know about investing ethically
text:
All eyes are on the 16-year-old eco-warrior whose fierce speech at the UN’s Climate Action Summit had millions glued to their screens.

Greta Thunberg has forced the question of how we treat our planet into the spotlight. Yet how will the Swedish schoolgirl – and her teen army of followers – fare in sticking to their green principles when they enter the adult world and have to start thinking about savings, pensions and buying a home?

Follow our Telegraph Money guide to learn how to manage your money like a climate-champion while also ensuring you have the financial security to enjoy the world you’re protecting.

What does “responsible” investment even mean?
